rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.13+commit.abaa5c0e"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[],"name":"ARBSYS","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Primitives for cross-chain aware contracts for https://arbitrum.io/[Arbitrum].
